mapper.select: SELECT A.ItemID, A.Item, A.QuestionID, B.SurveyID, B.Subject, B.Description, B.RegistDate, B.respondentYn, B.totCnt, CASE WHEN totCnt = 0 THEN '' ELSE ((SELECT COUNT(AnswerID) FROM covi_smart4j.survey_question_item_answer C WHERE C.ItemID = A.ItemID) / totCnt * 100) END AS rate FROM covi_smart4j.survey_question_item A JOIN (SELECT A.SurveyID, A.Subject, A.Description, LOWER(DATE_FORMAT(A.RegistDate, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")) AS RegistDate, IF ((SELECT COUNT(RespondentID) FROM covi_smart4j.survey_respondent C WHERE C.SurveyID = A.SurveyID AND RespondentCode = #{userId}) > 0, 'Y', 'N') AS respondentYn, (SELECT COUNT(AnswerID) FROM covi_smart4j.survey_question_item_answer D WHERE D.SurveyID = A.SurveyID) AS totCnt FROM covi_smart4j.survey A LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.survey_question B ON A.SurveyID = B.SurveyID WHERE NOW() BETWEEN SurveyStartDate AND SurveyEndDate AND State = 'F' AND QuestionCount = 1 AND QuestionType = 'S' AND Fn_SurveyTargetRespondent_R(A.SurveyID, #{userId}) = 'Y' ORDER BY RegistDate DESC LIMIT 1 ) B ON A.SurveyID = B.SurveyID ORDER BY rate DESC, ItemNO ASC
